benchmark_details.name: InfoQuest
benchmark_details.overview: InfoQuest is a multi-turn chat benchmark designed to evaluate how dialogue agents handle hidden context in open-ended user requests, requiring models to engage in information-seeking dialogue through clarifying questions.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: Evaluate dialogue agents in open-ended conversations

data.source: Generated using LLMs to simulate user requests and various personas
data.annotation: Qualitatively assessed by evaluating dialogue agents on their ability to gather context

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on the ability of agents to ask clarifying questions and gather relevant information
methodology.interpretation: Higher cumulative rewards indicate better information-seeking behavior in dialogues
methodology.validation: Evaluated across multiple dialogue models in varied scenarios
